text: Marchélepot-Misery is a commune. It is in Hauts-de-France in the Somme department in north France. The municipality was created on 1 January 2019 and consists of the former communes of Marchélepot (the seat) and Misery.Arrêté préfectoral 28 September 2018 == References == Category:2019 establishments in France Category:Communes in Somme
title: Marchélepot-Misery
